Color.description: Color for the tag. Can be one of the predefined colors or a hexadecimal color code. If it is a color code, then it must be in the format of either #RRGGBB or #RRGGBBAA.

Style.description: The string value is a [style class](../../../Styles/TagItemClass.style.md) name for the tag label. `Style` has priority over `Color` if both are defined.
